banner.title: Greetings, my name is Mahay.
banner.description: A Frontend Developer specialized in web development, committed to crafting compelling user interfaces and experiences for websites and web applications, thereby contributing to the overall success of the products.

aboutTitle.title: About me
aboutTitle.desc: In this section, you'll find a detailed overview of my passion for front-end development and the skills I bring to the table. I'm dedicated to creating visually appealing and functional interfaces, with expertise in various tools and technologies. Explore to discover more about my commitment to delivering high-quality front-end solutions.

aboutProjects.title: Projects
aboutProjects.desc: In this section, explore my personal achievements for a tangible glimpse into my expertise.

1.title: First IMMO
1.desc: The website of First IMMO, available at www.firstimmo.mg, is a platform specialized in real estate in Madagascar. With a user-friendly interface, the site provides a comprehensive range of services for individuals seeking real estate properties, whether for rent or purchase.

2.title: SANKO
2.desc: I created the landing page for the company SANKO. SANKO is an insurance brokerage and organizational consulting firm based in Madagascar and operating across the African continent.

3.title: TOA
3.desc: TOA is a market leader in the telecommunications tower infrastructure. I developed the front end of the showcase website with the Elementor team.

contact.title: Contact
contact.desc: Feel free to get in touch by completing the form below, and I'll promptly respond at your earliest convenience.

footer.title: Follow me
footer.desc: A Web Developer specializing in Frontend development, dedicated to constructing the user interface and experience for websites and web applications, contributing to the overall success of the product.
